name: Melody Of The Bubbles(Alpha)
description:
A rhythm game made by KursoraCat.

In this game you mission is to pop the bubble to the music.

The game only has 1 level at the moment but you can create your own.

Thank you for playing the game.

The game is still a work in progress and in Alpha phrase.  Feel free to give us suggestion.

Faqs:

Q:How long have you been making this game?

A:I don't really know how long but in the span of 2 months which was a lot of works and I mostly do this in free time.

Q:Which game inspired you to make this?

A:Various. But the one inspired this are Taiko no Tatsujin and Guitar Hero.

Q:Will there a change in the texture and effect of the game?

A:Yes it will. I still have a lot of busy stuffs and this is my fun project.

Q:Will there be new features to the game?

A:I don't really know. After i finish school I will revamp some of the textures and also update some game features, too. Or not I will be lazy or move to a newer project.

Big thanks to Huy(@FoundHuy) for contribute the character Ribbon to the game.

Found a bug? Comment down.
